articles.title: Josh McDaniels, Patriots QB coach setting the bar high for an improved Drake Maye in 2025
articles.description:
"He’s the quarterback of our football team, and so I’ve always had high expectations for the quarterback room in general."

The post Josh McDaniels, Patriots QB coach setting the bar high for an improved Drake Maye in 2025 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Josh McDaniels emphasizes high expectations for Patriots QB Drake Maye ahead of 2025 season.
Maye, the team's quarterback, aims to improve performance under McDaniels' guidance.
Enhanced quarterback play could significantly impact Patriots' success and fan engagement in Boston.

articles.title: More brands added to radioactive shrimp recall
articles.description:
See the list of recalled radioactive shrimp brands that were sold in Massachusetts.

The post More brands added to radioactive shrimp recall appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts adds more brands to the radioactive shrimp recall list.
Recalled shrimp brands include specific names sold in local stores.
Residents advised to check purchases to avoid health risks.

articles.title: Photos released of suspect who allegedly blew up ATM in Woburn
articles.description:
The FBI is searching for a masked man who dropped an explosive device at a drive-through ATM in Woburn early Thursday morning.

The post Photos released of suspect who allegedly blew up ATM in Woburn appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: FBI seeks masked suspect who detonated an explosive at Woburn ATM on September 6.
Explosive device caused significant damage at drive-through ATM, impacting local banking services.
Residents urged to report any sightings of the suspect to ensure community safety.
